title: More clues in Tampa serial killer probe; Did lawsuit loser kill attorney? Odd 911 call after murder!
itunes:title: More clues in Tampa serial killer probe; Did lawsuit loser kill attorney? Odd 911 call after murder!
description:
Tampa police hope new security video will help identify a person of interest in a series of street shooting deaths in the Florida city. Nancy Grace looks at the suspected serial killer case with forensic psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober, crime scene investigator Sheryl McCollum, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, WFLA-TV reporter Meredyth Censullo, and co-host Alan Duke. Reporter Scott Kimbler joins Grace and her experts to discuss the shooting death of Kansas City lawyer Tom Pickert. Grace also listens to a series of unusual 911 calls connected to the stabbing death of an Ohio teacher. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
